name: RepaintBoundary
info: Creates a separate display list for child components to improve performance. It is used in components such as TextField, DrawerController, Scrollbar, and Sliver in the source code.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of RepaintBoundary
desc: For example, in the above drawing view, even if shouldRepaint is false, the paint method will be continuously executed during scrolling. Using RepaintBoundary can avoid unnecessary drawing.

nodes.name: Save Widget as Image
desc: Through RenderRepaintBoundary, you can obtain the Image information of the child component, and then save the bytes as an image file.
